text: My name is Mario Duarte.
I work for Volkswagen Group of America.
I am responsible for the learning, training
and development for all of that.

We are in the middle of
implementing an HR IS system
to handle the employee data.

We needed to map our 4,000
unique job descriptions

to one of the 3,200 job
roles in the global template
for this new system.

The Amazon Q app is so
easy to use, it's so intuitive.
The result was great. We were able
to achieve the due date.

If we were not able to
achieve the due date,

then we will actually
delay Canada and Mexico,

and if we delay the whole
North American region,

we will be delaying all the
regions in the world on their
actual implementation.
A professional person from human resources,

not having any technical
background, was able to develop
that first draft of the tool within a day.

The workflow automation is
something that I can see a lot

of value if we added to
some of the processes
that we have within human resources
and beyond human resources,
also in the production facility.
We definitely have the capability

and opportunity to continue
to have different use cases
for Amazon Q apps
and look into the continuous improvement
that Amazon is bringing to these tools.
